Text: Block them using the FireWall your using, in case your using Kaspersky Internet Security like me, open Kaspersky and go to Settings, then FireWall and open the FireWall settings, locate newsoftwares folder in the given lost, right click on it and block. apply the settings and your done. :)

I'm just using my windows firewall.  Block the WinFLTray.exe [with your firewall setting] which is located in the C:WindowsSystem32  folder on a 32-bit or C:WindowsSysWOW64 folder on a 64-bit OS.

Seems to be working 100% so far!!!
